name: Dreamstate Racing
description:
Race against your friends or alone in an "aesthetic" environment in this arcade racing game.

Features
  • up to 4-player local multiplayer
  • 6 different cars
  • 2 levels
  • badly driving bots
  • amazing music

Credits:
We are a small team of students who made this game as a two months learning project.

Code:
  • Tomi Sepänmaa
  • Joonas Aro
  • Miro Mäkinen
  • Tapio Kemppainen
  • Timo Rautiainen

Art:

  • Max Männikkö
  • Venja Vitikka
